entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:23 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 01:46 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

Visibility: 4.8 km

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to freezing rain or rain this evening then to a few flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 3. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
